page.title: 13HEALTH AND WELFARE
page.content: THERE ARE NO RESIDENT DOCTORS OR PHARMACISTS AT EITHER HOLDENBY OR SPRATTON, THE NEAREST CHEMIST BEING AT KINGSTHORPE THREE MILES AWAY. AT SPRATTON THERE IS A SURGERY HELD IN A PRIVATE HOUSE, THESE DOCTORS OPERATING FROM GUILSBOROUGH AND BRIXWORTH. THEY DO HOWEVER OPERATE A VERY GOOD DRUGS DELIVERY SERVICE, WHICH IS APPRECIATED VERY MUCH BY THE LOCAL OLDER PEOPLE, WHO HAVE NO TRANSPORT. THE MORE ELDERLY CITIZENS ARE MAINLY VERY HEALTHY DUR TO THE SLOWER PACE OF LIFE IN THE COMMUNITY AND ALSO THEY HAVE PLENTY OF FRESH FRUIT AND VEGETABLES GROWN BY THE VILLAGERS.
